title: FALSE: Photo shows Joma Sison in a coma
subtitle: The photo was manipulated, and Sison addressed the claim on the same day, saying he is healthy.
author: rappler.com
vclaim:
A graphic circulated on August 27 with a photo of Sison allegedly in a hospital ward, along with the text, "Jose Maria Sison na coma sa Netherlands, agaw buhay!" (Jose Maria Sison in a coma in the Netherlands, now in critical condition!)

At least 3 posts contained this graphic, getting a total of 2,632 reactions, 1,759 comments, and 4,639 shares as of writing. These posts were flagged by Facebook Claim Check, a tool that detects potentially false content on the platform.

The photo was manipulated, and Sison debunked the claim on the same day, saying he is healthy.

A reverse image search showed that the original photo was that of a different person, and was sourced from the website wisegeek.com. It also showed that the altered graphic circulated as early as August 2018.

On Facebook, Sison addressed the claim saying the image of him was photoshopped and that he is healthy.

Keep us aware of suspicious Facebook pages, groups, accounts, websites, articles, or photos in your network by contacting us at factcheck@rappler.com. Let us battle disinformation one Fact Check at a time.
